entry.title: Good Thing We Didn't Throw This Out!

media:group.media:title: Good Thing We Didn't Throw This Out!
media:group.media:description:
Get a 60-day free trial at https://www.shipstation.com/hercules. Thanks to ShipStation for sponsoring the show!
Good Thing We Didn't Throw This Out! Julia's favorite candy is the cranberry hard candy. So after one of the cranberry batches stuck together the idea came to life! Instead of throwing out the stuck together cranberry hard candy we smashed it up into little tiny pieces and made a bark out of it! 🌐Our website! https://tinyurl.com/Very-cranberry-bark
If you like the sounds of candy making then you'll love our ASMR channel! https://www.youtube.com/@HerculesCandyASMR --------------------------------------------------- Subscribe and hit the 🔔 for new videos every Tuesday and Friday (unless posting these videos have made us too busy 😂) --------------------------------------------------- 😊 Let’s stay in touch! 📌Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/herculescandy/?hl=en 📌Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Hercules-Candy-Co-145420888813009/ 📌TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@herculescandy?lang=en --------------------------------------------------- 🕒 Timestamps 00:00 intro 00:15 the NEW bark! 1:09 hammering cranberry hard candy 4:07 adding dried cranberrys 6:18 adding chocolate/mixing 9:22 cutting bark 10:25 ShipStation ad 11:42 taste test! 16:35 packaging the bark 20:02 bloopers --------------------------------------------------- 👕Check out our Teespring merch! https://teespring.com/stores/hercules-candys-store --------------------------------------------------- 💑 About Hercules Candy Hercules Candy has been on Steve’s side of the family since 1910(ish). When he took over in the 70’s, he anticipated after 10 years of hard work, he could move the business out of the basement and into a real storefront. Unfortunately, it took until 2018 for that to happen, but hey at least it happened! Steve and Terry own the shop, Craig (the social media manager) is their son, Cara (wrapper and shipper extraordinaire who is poised to take over the shop one day) is their daughter and Leah (who doesn’t love being on camera and is very elusive) is their oldest daughter. Karen has been working for Hercules Candy since the twins (Craig and Cara) were about 6 months old and everybody else is a new recruit. Don’t forget to subscribe and hit the 🔔 for more videos! --------------------------------------------------- 🎶Music used: SLPSTRM - Side Hustle Earth Tone - A Window to Your World --------------------------------------------------- 💰 Affiliate links: Purchasing anything off of Amazon 24 hours after clicking any of these links helps support the channel at no cost to you!
our chocolate tempering thermometer: https://amzn.to/2RI7ZAS my camera: https://amzn.to/2OkcEZd my lens: https://amzn.to/2AaulHo my editing suite: https://amzn.to/3gqYYIy my microphone: https://amzn.to/2NMVVwB

media:group.media:title: 2 Ingredients Changed Everything!
media:group.media:description:
2 ingredients changed everything! Julia added just the right amount to really bring out the flavor of the creams with just the right amount of tartness. I know you're going to love them!
🌐Our website! https://herculescandy.com/
If you like the sounds of candy making then you'll love our ASMR channel! https://www.youtube.com/@HerculesCandyASMR --------------------------------------------------- Subscribe and hit the 🔔 for new videos every Tuesday and Friday (unless posting these videos have made us too busy 😂) --------------------------------------------------- 😊 Let’s stay in touch! 📌Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/herculescandy/?hl=en 📌Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Hercules-Candy-Co-145420888813009/ 📌TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@herculescandy?lang=en --------------------------------------------------- 🕒 Timestamps 00:00 starting with strawberry lemonade! 5:50 making the tart peach creams! 11:29 blackberry! 18:52 enrobing Terry's Terrific Tart Treats! 22:46 cross sections! 25:22 the taste tests! 34:40 packaging with Leah! 40:08 who was the WINNER a couple videos ago? --------------------------------------------------- 👕Check out our Teespring merch! https://teespring.com/stores/hercules-candys-store --------------------------------------------------- 💑 About Hercules Candy Hercules Candy has been on Steve’s side of the family since 1910(ish). When he took over in the 70’s, he anticipated after 10 years of hard work, he could move the business out of the basement and into a real storefront. Unfortunately, it took until 2018 for that to happen, but hey at least it happened! Steve and Terry own the shop, Craig (the social media manager) is their son, Cara (wrapper and shipper extraordinaire who is poised to take over the shop one day) is their daughter and Leah (who doesn’t love being on camera and is very elusive) is their oldest daughter. Karen has been working for Hercules Candy since the twins (Craig and Cara) were about 6 months old and everybody else is a new recruit. Don’t forget to subscribe and hit the 🔔 for more videos! --------------------------------------------------- 🎶Music used: Lalinea - Red Gamba --------------------------------------------------- 💰 Affiliate links: Purchasing anything off of Amazon 24 hours after clicking any of these links helps support the channel at no cost to you!

entry.title: Steve & Terry Escaped to a Candy Convention!

media:group.media:description:

entry.title: This candy took over a week to make, but it was worth every second!

media:group.media:title: This candy took over a week to make, but it was worth every second!
media:group.media:description:
This candy took over a week to make, but it was worth every second! First we made the double chocolate coated cherries. Then we let them sit for a week so they could get juicier over time. Then we covered THAT in truffle batter before the final coating of chocolate! And they take so long to make that we made less than 50 of them. So get them while you still can!
Get your cherry truffle bombs here! https://tinyurl.com/cherry-truffle-bombs
If you like the sounds of candy making then you'll love our ASMR channel! https://www.youtube.com/@HerculesCandyASMR --------------------------------------------------- Subscribe and hit the 🔔 for new videos every Tuesday and Friday (unless posting these videos have made us too busy 😂) --------------------------------------------------- 😊 Let’s stay in touch! 📌Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/herculescandy/?hl=en 📌Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Hercules-Candy-Co-145420888813009/ 📌TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@herculescandy?lang=en --------------------------------------------------- 🕒 Timestamps 00:00 panning the cherries in sugar 1:06 chocolate covering the cherries 6:01 1 week later 9:35 24 hours later 12:24 chocolate covering the cherries and truffles 16:31 the taste test we've all been waiting for! 17:33 packaging the cherry truffle bombs 24:12 goodbye from Mom and Dad Hercules 👋 --------------------------------------------------- 👕Check out our Teespring merch! https://teespring.com/stores/hercules-candys-store --------------------------------------------------- 💑 About Hercules Candy Hercules Candy has been on Steve’s side of the family since 1910(ish). When he took over in the 70’s, he anticipated after 10 years of hard work, he could move the business out of the basement and into a real storefront. Unfortunately, it took until 2018 for that to happen, but hey at least it happened! Steve and Terry own the shop, Craig (the social media manager) is their son, Cara (wrapper and shipper extraordinaire who is poised to take over the shop one day) is their daughter and Leah (who doesn’t love being on camera and is very elusive) is their oldest daughter. Karen has been working for Hercules Candy since the twins (Craig and Cara) were about 6 months old and everybody else is a new recruit. Don’t forget to subscribe and hit the 🔔 for more videos! --------------------------------------------------- 🎶Music used: Kicktracks - Echo Park Kashido - The Star Spangled Banner --------------------------------------------------- 💰 Affiliate links: Purchasing anything off of Amazon 24 hours after clicking any of these links helps support the channel at no cost to you!
our chocolate tempering thermometer: https://amzn.to/2RI7ZAS my camera: https://amzn.to/2OkcEZd my lens: https://amzn.to/2AaulHo my editing suite: https://amzn.to/3gqYYIy my microphone: https://amzn.to/2NMVVwB

Steve and Terry own the shop, Craig (the social media manager) is their son, Cara (wrapper and shipper extraordinaire who is poised to take over the shop one day) is their daughter and Leah (who doesn’t love being on camera and is very elusive) is their oldest daughter. Karen has been working for Hercules Candy since the twins (Craig and Cara) were about 6 months old and everybody else is a new recruit. Don’t forget to subscribe and hit the 🔔 for more videos! --------------------------------------------------- 🎶Music used: Warmkeys - better off --------------------------------------------------- 💰 Affiliate links: Purchasing anything off of Amazon 24 hours after clicking any of these links helps support the channel at no cost to you!
our chocolate tempering thermometer: https://amzn.to/2RI7ZAS my camera: https://amzn.to/2OkcEZd my lens: https://amzn.to/2AaulHo my editing suite: https://amzn.to/3gqYYIy my microphone: https://amzn.to/2NMVVwB

When he took over in the 70’s, he anticipated after 10 years of hard work, he could move the business out of the basement and into a real storefront. Unfortunately, it took until 2018 for that to happen, but hey at least it happened! Steve and Terry own the shop, Craig (the social media manager) is their son, Cara (wrapper and shipper extraordinaire who is poised to take over the shop one day) is their daughter and Leah (who doesn’t love being on camera and is very elusive) is their oldest daughter.
